name: RestoreSqlDatabaseToSqlDatabase
description: Restore an Azure SQL Database to another Azure SQL Database on the same server using the latest point-in-time backup
author: Geek Learning

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to target for executing SQL

inputs.name: ServerName
inputs.label: Azure SQL Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure SQL Server name like, FabrikamSQL.database.windows.net,1433 or FabrikamSQL.database.windows.net.

inputs.name: SourceDatabaseName
inputs.label: Source Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the source Azure SQL Database from which to restore.

inputs.name: TargetDatabaseName
inputs.label: Target Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the target Azure SQL Database. If exists, will be deleted prior to restore!

inputs.name: PointInTimeWindow
inputs.label: Point In Time Window
inputs.helpMarkDown: How many minutes into the past to look for a backup to restore from.
